company.name: Raiku
company.description: Raiku is a Solana-focused infrastructure and education platform that helps developers and users understand blockchain architecture through clear, analogy-driven content. They specialize in making complex technical concepts accessible while maintaining technical depth, bridging the gap between Solana's advanced parallel execution model and developer comprehension.
company.target_audience: Blockchain developers, Web3 builders, technical users seeking to understand Solana's programming model, and teams building on Solana infrastructure
key_messages: Making Solana's architecture understandable through clear mental models
Parallel execution through separation of code and state
Building understanding from the ground up

primary.name: Raiku Neon
primary.usage: Primary accent color, highlights, interactive elements, logo fills, key visual indicators, CTAs

accent.name: Raiku Neon
accent.usage: Same as primary - single accent color system

colors.palette_mood: Ultra-minimal three-color system. Pure black (#000204) provides depth and technical gravitas. Crisp white (#FDFDFF) ensures maximum readability. Electric neon (#C0FF38) delivers instant recognition and creates a signature look that cuts through typical Web3 visual noise. No gradients, no grays, no compromise - every element is definitively one of three colors.

data.usage: Code examples, technical specs, blockchain addresses, timing metrics (50ms)

typography.style_notes: Typography emphasizes technical credibility with monospace elements for code and data while maintaining readability for educational long-form content. The style balances developer-tool aesthetics with approachable body copy for explanatory content.

visual_style.overall_aesthetic: Dark-mode technical infrastructure meets isometric world-building. Three-color-only system (black, white, neon) creates unmistakable brand recognition.

imagery.illustration_examples: Isometric cityscapes representing blockchain networks, white wireframe vehicles and infrastructure with neon (#C0FF38) accent highlights, technical flow diagrams with dot-grid patterns, global network maps with hexagonal node markers, layered card stacks representing accounts/data structures

iconography.notes: Checkmarks in lime circles for confirmations, hexagonal containers for key elements, consistent wireframe aesthetic

shapes.border_radius: 4-8px for UI elements, hexagonal for brand marks
shapes.signature_shape: Hexagon with embedded chevron/arrow - appears as logo mark

buttons.primary: Black (#000204) background with neon (#C0FF38) text/border, neon glow on hover
buttons.secondary: Transparent with white (#FDFDFF) border, neon (#C0FF38) accent on interaction
buttons.states: Hover: neon glow effect. Active: filled neon with black text. Disabled: reduced opacity white

cards.style: Black (#000204) backgrounds, white (#FDFDFF) wireframe borders, subtle rounded corners
cards.variants: Information cards with neon accent headers, layered stack visualizations

diagrams.style: Dot-grid backgrounds, flow arrows, labeled sections (AOT/JIT), timing indicators
diagrams.colors: Neon (#C0FF38) for active/highlighted states, white (#FDFDFF) for wireframes/labels on black (#000204) backgrounds

brand_voice.language_style: Uses analogies to explain complex concepts (warehouse analogy for accounts). Technical accuracy without jargon overload. Builds understanding progressively from fundamentals to advanced topics. Direct and confident while remaining approachable.
key_phrases: Once it clicks, everything else makes sense

extraction_metadata.confidence_notes: Six brand illustration assets show highly consistent visual language: isometric 3D style, wireframe aesthetics, single neon accent color, pure black backgrounds. Color palette refined to exact brand specification: black (#000204), white (#FDFDFF), neon (#C0FF38). Social content confirms technical-educational brand positioning focused on Solana infrastructure.

crypto_native_indicators: Dark mode dominant (100% across all assets)
Distinctive lime accent (differentiates from typical blue/purple Web3)
Technical diagrams explaining validator sidecars, JIT compilation
tech_stack_hints: Consistent design system across all assets
anti_patterns: Avoids typical Web3 color schemes (no purple/blue gradients, no grays)
Three-color-only system - no color variations or tints
Prioritizes technical accuracy over marketing fluff

illustration_system.rendering: White (#FDFDFF) wireframe base on black (#000204) with solid neon (#C0FF38) accent fills
illustration_system.grid_system: Triangular/isometric grid pattern in white wireframe on black backgrounds
illustration_system.accent_application: Neon (#C0FF38) fills highlight active/important elements while white wireframes show context/structure
illustration_system.logo_treatment: Hexagonal container with embedded chevron/arrow shape, filled with neon (#C0FF38) accent
